code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded shadow-sm product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product._id}`,className:"product-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{src:product.image,variant:"top",className:"product-img",alt:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"product-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product._id}`,className:"product-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",className:"product-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"div",className:"product-brand text-muted",children:["Th\u01B0\u01A1ng hi\u1EC7u: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.brand})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",className:"product-rating",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:`${product.numReviews} đánh giá`,color:"#f8e825"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",className:"product-price text-success",children:[new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN').format(product.price)," VN\u0110"]})]})]});};export default Product;
